summary: Diff adds a new PostOrderConfirmationModal and wires it into App.tsx to show a single post-order confirmation experience after successful backend order creation, including a Paytm QR image and a bill breakdown with a fixed ₹20 delivery charge and computed grand total. WhatsApp auto-open vs popup-blocked fallback appears to be handled via an optional whatsappLink prop in the same modal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the required Paytm QR code image asset (paytm-qr.dim_900x900.png) so the QR is visibly displayed in the confirmation UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The modal references an image path (/assets/generated/paytm-qr.dim_900x900.png), but the diff does not show the required image being added to the repository; without the asset, the QR may not actually render.

missing_requirements.requirement: All user-facing text in the confirmation UI is in English.
missing_requirements.reason: The confirmation UI includes a large "✅" in the success message area; while not a language, it is non-English user-facing content and may violate the strict "English only" constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard functionality and copied-state UI for the WhatsApp fallback link in the post-order confirmation modal.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-27 requires showing a fallback link if WhatsApp is blocked, but does not request copy-to-clipboard behavior or copied indicators.

hallucinated_features.description: Body scroll locking while the modal is open.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-25/26/27; it is additional UX behavior beyond the specified confirmation content.
